name: RYAN BLACK
description: Fight, run, jump and climb making your way through ruined African village and military base to a secret genetic factory. Use all the possible means to survive and discover what happened, and then decide where your loyalties lie.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: 2GHz+ or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB Video Card or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3.3 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9 compatible sound card
